record.title: COPS IMPROVEMENTS ACT OF 2007
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1700, as amended, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Michigan (Mr. Conyers) that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1700, as amended.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: ALLEN
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, in roll call 348, which I just missed a minute ago, the COPS Improvements Act of 2007, I am a strong supporter of that bill. That bill provides, we believe, 165 police positions in my home State of Maine. I certainly intended to vote for that bill and would have had I been in the Chamber at that moment.
